name: Scream Mr.Jack - MD
description:
This game is created for the Mega Drive / Sega Genesis. You can play it with an emulator or with a real console...

It is a port of the game Scream Mr. Jack and it was ported for the Retro Platform Jam #1 for the Mega Drive / Sega Genesis with the use of SGDK

Some graphics had to change to apeal for the new resolution and palette.

Sounds completly replaced.

P.S. I wanted to port the engine of Scream Mr. Jack to run on Mega Drive and to write a new story, but the port had been proved quite dificult and I run out of time for a new story.

So...

Scream Mr.Jack Scream....
